mapper.sql: emp_id, emp_pwd, emp_name, emp_phone, emp_rrnum, emp_address, emp_div, emp_salary, emp_hiredate, emp_retiredate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_employee ( emp_id, emp_pwd, emp_name, emp_phone, emp_rrnum, emp_address, emp_div, emp_hiredate ) VALUES ( #{empId}, #{empPwd}, #{empName}, #{empPhone}, #{empRrnum}, #{empAddress}, #{empDiv}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_employee SET emp_pwd = #{empPwd} , emp_name = #{empName} , emp_phone = #{empPhone} , emp_rrnum = #{empRrnum} , emp_address = #{empAddress} , emp_salary = #{empSalary} , emp_div = #{empDiv} WHERE emp_id = #{empId}
UPDATE tb_employee SET emp_retiredate = SYSDATE WHERE emp_id = #{empId}
